Sentencas: Gas-tight seals based on glasses suitable for joining of materials with high thermal expansion coefficients are for example required for solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Binary, ternary and quaternary silicates of CaO, BaO and ZnO in high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: If these seals are to be used at high temperatures, they can only be fabricated from glasses which enable the crystallization of phases with high thermal expansion coefficients.
Titulo: Binary, ternary and quaternary silicates of CaO, BaO and ZnO in high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: This paper reports on some components from systems suitable for high thermal expansion seals: binary calcium silicates, CaSiO3, Ca3Si2O7 and Ca2SiO4 zinc silicates, Zn2SiO4, ternary silicates of BaO, CaO and ZnO, BaCa2Si3O9, Ca2ZnSi2O7, and one quaternary silicate, Ba2CaZn2Si6O17, studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Binary, ternary and quaternary silicates of CaO, BaO and ZnO in high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: Only CaSiO3, Ca3Si2O7 and BaCa2Si3O9 exhibit thermal expansion coefficients in the range suitable for high thermal expansion seals of 11.2-11.8 x 10(-6) K-1 (100-800 degrees C).
Titulo: Binary, ternary and quaternary silicates of CaO, BaO and ZnO in high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: The thermal expansions strongly depend on the respective crystallo-graphic axis.
Titulo: Binary, ternary and quaternary silicates of CaO, BaO and ZnO in high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion of a sealing glass is not only affected by the thermal expansions of the crystalline phases, but also by that of the residual glassy phase as well as by the elastic properties.
Titulo: Binary, ternary and quaternary silicates of CaO, BaO and ZnO in high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: The phase formation should carefully be controlled also with respect to aging.
Titulo: Binary, ternary and quaternary silicates of CaO, BaO and ZnO in high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)
